replies.body: I took a quick look over your account and it looks like there might have been a password change not too long ago. Double check that you're using the correct password, and if this wasn't you who changed it, reach out to our accounts team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) ASAP to protect your account!

due to the lack of unavailability to login, i was unable to get back into the ranked game and lost LP for this, i would like to receive it back or some sort of compensation for the entirety of the issue, as it was clearly out of my hands.
hey broporo is there any way I can message you about his problem and see if you can help, I have sent in many tickets to get this done but had no luck and I really want my account back
i changed password twice but both instances, unable to login due to unexpected error
I'm having the same problem been looking for any sort of way to resolve it
